title: Ultra-Cold Cryogenic TEM Sample Holder with Liquid Helium and High Stability
content: Here, we introduce a novel ultra-low-temperature transmission electron microscope sample holder capable of atomic resolution with liquid helium cooling. This custom holder can reach a wide range of cryogenic temperatures (≥23 K) in scanning transmission electron microscopes (S/TEM) with ±2 mK thermal stability over a period of 10+ hours [1].
